content: So I'm inclined to just r+ https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/60826... any thoughts @T-compiler? It's a PR that improves the gdb/lldm pretty printers, which I think don't really have an owner right now? The changes all look good to me -- maybe we could request more tests, I suppose.
debuginfo tests have been broken for a long while in a few ways I think :(
but I think you can r+ that PR
if someone complains we can revert it
maybe tell the PR opener to open a forum post telling people to try the new pretty printers out
not a bad idea, can you post on the PR? gotta run right now
